data.name: Void's Ballad Demo
data.detailed_description:
Void’s Ballad is a dark investigative adventure though the biggest human fear: Death.

You play as Phoebe, a joyful girl who has been shocked by the car accident that involved Joey, her boyfriend. She found out a mysterious note that made her realize that he might have planned that accident for months.

You have to explore the house, find clues and discover more about Joey and Phoebe’s past, pass through seven days to save a life and gather information all around you.

Will You Save Joey?

Explore the House Through Phoebe’s Eyes


The fear has taken over Phoebe and it’s your turn to find a way out. Look around, you might not know what lures in the darkness of the mind, use your phone, it might reveal things you may not see, and gather items, they can always be useful.

Don’t be afraid, take everything you can!


Even when you think that those items will never be useful, try and take them, you might always be surprised! But choose wisely, sometimes you might not be able to carry all of that precious loot!

Be Careful


You will need patience and a keen eye to choose what to take and you might need to double check some of the ints, but don’t worry, you will have all the time you need to save your love.

data.short_description: Void’s Ballad is a dark investigative adventure though the biggest human fear: Death.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game talks about suicide in many ways.
